name: Butter Chicken
process: First, mix your yogurt marinade together Marinate chicken for 20 minutes, or overnight if time allows. (The longer it marinates, the more tender your chicken will be.) Sear chicken in a skillet or pan. Keep those charred bits on the pan to make your sauce. Browned bits = flavour. If you have too many burnt pieces stuck to the pan, you can discard some of them if you wish Finally, make your curry sauce in the same skillet.
